name: 回家
description:
It's my second Ren'py visual novel.  again, it's more like an  exercise than a developed game.  but this time,  there are choices. 

Traditional Chinese only.

 I would like to thank Zeil Learnings's Day and Time with Actions Template and all her tutorials. without her, I can't make this little project possible.

【Background Materials used】

  Wpcpey, CC BY 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons 
  Aimcotest, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons

  WiNG, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons 
  Mk2010, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
